website_summaries.verdict: A solid choice for quantity, quality, and value. A rugged set that outperforms the competition.
pros: Owners say they work with almost any type of furniture and look great too
An impressive number of sliders (16) for a reasonable price
cons: They don't work perfectly with extremely large furniture pieces, but they move most types of furniture with ease

customer_reviews.title: Money Savers
customer_reviews.text: Here is my story about these little dears. I had new laminate flooring put down in 2 bedrooms and when I received the estimate there was a charge of $80.00 for taking the furniture out and putting it back in after the job was done. OH NO SAYS I. These little dears saved me $80.00 by allowing me to empty both rooms by just pushing or pulling furniture around, especially after the new floors were installed without any scrapes or scratches. Also, I left 4 of them under the feet of the bed. they look a little funny but I can now move the bed around without scratching the floor. All in all, very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DebbieL.

customer_reviews.title: You Gotta Have These
customer_reviews.text: If you are moving furniture on carpet - these sliders are for you! We just had a huge rummage sale at the church and I put these sliders under the couches and furniture that needed to be moved. Easy as can be...ladies could "slide" the furniture out of the way, then move it back into position. I left them on the couches where our youth "rearrange" the rooms every week to protect the carpet. I will definitely use them again next years' sale. Our carpet is a low pile, commercial grade. Not sure how they would work on a deep pile carpet.
customer_reviews.author: James C Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Helpful but not reliable long term
customer_reviews.text: These make moving furniture so much easier. A word of caution though, the black foamy bits that you set the furniture on tend to slide out of the cup, and the plastic cup also tends to bow and misshape from the weight of the furniture. Be prepared to order extras or get more every time you move. That being said, while they last they are absolutely an improvement over moving things by hand, in some cases making it so it is possible to move things that were too heavy to move before.
customer_reviews.author: Saralynne

customer_reviews.title: Wow! I can move my furniture!
customer_reviews.text: I had to move 3 pieces of furniture, one queen and one king adjustable beds...very heavy.... i could not even push them one inch. also a reclining chair which i could not budge. i was skeptical but ordered these anyway. Wow!!! i moved all 3 pieces . oh yes, there was a 4th piece i moved...my treadmill. I also moved it. These were a life saver. I am a female senior citizen and had no one i could call on to help me. (my husband is very ill and could not help.)Fantastic! Thank you for an easy and inexpensive solution to a real problem.
customer_reviews.author: alanna

customer_reviews.title: They really work
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical about these carpet sliders for under our split king bed which sits on a well padded carpet but they really work. We need to slide the beds apart to put the fitted sheet on the bed. These make it so easy to slide the bed and stay under the beds feet. I also put them under my dresser. I love these things.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: They work.
customer_reviews.text: A recent paint job in my apartment had me moving sizable and quite heavy bedroom pieces around, pieces that sometimes left gouges in the floor. Obviously, there had to be a better way, and I was happy to find one with the Smart Surface furniture sliders. Previous experience hadn't been particularly useful, but mainly because the sliders were not large enough to get the job done. These are. They are easy to use, reasonably priced, and, most important, work.
customer_reviews.author: ronald walcott

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: These were placed under the feet for a sofa and a loveseat. The tiny feet caused permanent indentations in the carpet. These sliders spread the weight and saved the carpet. After placing the sliders the furniture often slid a little when sitting or getting up from the sofa. After a while the slight depressions that they made in the carpet were enough to keep the furniture in place without permanently indenting the carpet. They also make it easier to move the furniture when vacuuming.
customer_reviews.author: Sonu

customer_reviews.title: Don't life when you can slide and don't slide anything without these!
customer_reviews.text: Same comments as on my previous review on a similar product: I bought a bunch of these because I was having new wall to wall carpet installed and had to move all the furniture from one room to the other. Sliding, relatively effortlessly, is way better than lifting. Don't lift when you can slide, and don't slide anything without these.
customer_reviews.author: Zulema - PRINTSMART, LLC

customer_reviews.title: Wait a bit before moving the furniture.
customer_reviews.text: These pads work fine as long as you allow some time for the weight of the furniture to dimple the pads. Otherwise they will just flip out from under the legs. Also if the furniture is real light they may not follow when you slide it. It's important to get the legs centered on the pads also. There is still a depression in the carpet but it recovers quicker after a few vacummings.
customer_reviews.author: Bingo Cat

customer_reviews.title: Moving of the big stuff much more safe and easier too
customer_reviews.text: Hi Jeff, I purchased the sliders so we could move our big heavy recliner around from time to time as needed, and it work very well. We are going to use them on some of the other heavy furniture we have. They slide very smoothly and quickly over the carpet. So I will get the larger sliders for the bigger furniture in the house, this will make the moving of the big stuff much more safe and easier too. Thanks for a great product, Mike.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Only works with light furniture
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy these if you want to move something heavy like a sofa. Too small, comes off the foot when trying hard to move. It's easier to pick up the furniture then use these so called sliders.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: My stupidly heavy desk is still movable
customer_reviews.text: When I moved to a new place where my absurdly heavy desk was going to be placed on carpet vs solid flooring, I was worried that I wouldn't be able to move it to fix wiring. I put these sliders under the feet of the desk, and while it takes a lot of effort, it does move. I took off one star since these could work better, and more importantly, they have a habit of slowly sliding off of the feet, vs staying under the right points of the desk.
customer_reviews.author: Deriachai

customer_reviews.title: If I could give them a 6 I would!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give them a 6 I would! These little babies work amazingly well! Me and a friend were moving furniture around and having a hard time because most of the pieces were solid wood... a piece that was 200 lbs that the two of us could barely move now glides effortlessly across the carpet with one person... I would HIGHLY recommend this product... P.S. my friend like them so much she bought them for her place as well!
customer_reviews.author: illen

customer_reviews.title: Easy move across carpet
customer_reviews.text: These round carpet sliders are very useful. I am a small person under a hundred lbs and these sliders are very helpful when trying to move all sorts of heavy furniture. I have left them permanently under some of my frequently moved furniture pieces such as couch sectional pieces and a big armchair and a writing desk. Would recommend this product to make moving furniture across the carpet easier.
customer_reviews.author: meg

customer_reviews.title: Extremely effective!
customer_reviews.text: Knew they would help, but was amazed at just how super effective they really are! Ordered them after struggling to turn my heavy table around by myself. After putting these sliders under it’s legs, I can now EASILY push the entire table over with just 1 light push in the center. Works so well that even a toddler could move my heavy table now, lol
customer_reviews.author: Clydella M Birkholz

customer_reviews.title: I felt as if I am a super woman. Absolutely Great product
customer_reviews.text: If you want to move furniture or if you want to protect your carpet this is the product you must use. I'm a senior citizen, I used my car's jack to lift my heavy dresser and placed this product under each leg. I felt as if I am a super woman. Absolutely Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Yazbek

customer_reviews.title: These are lifesavers and you need them right now.

Or, if you're moving in general, slap these under your stuff and they'll breeze right along without any hassle. Amazing. I bought 3 packs of em.
customer_reviews.author: Booticus

customer_reviews.title: Nice to have although you need a lot of them for easy movement

However, I wanted to permanently leave them attached so I could move my shelves to vacuum/clean/rearrang..., so I placed double-sided tape and affixed then semi-permanently to the bottom of the shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product!
customer_reviews.text: Every Thanksgiving to make room in my dining room for 2 tables we have to move our hutch and it is really a pain in the butt. So I saw these and decided to give them a try. customer_reviews.author: ADennehey

Easy to use - they just slip under the legs of the furniture and you are good to go.
customer_reviews.author: lewisfan

customer_reviews.author: jp85

customer_reviews.title: WAY better than expected.

No more doubts here. I highly recommend!

I've rearranged rooms every few months with ease and no stress. Also, I have a bad back and hated having to get friends to help me. No need with these.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THEM!!

Shipping was fast. I am very satisfied with them, I hope they last. I have had them for bout 2 months but am fixing to make an accent wall in that room n am sure I'll be using them to move furniture away from the wall I'll be painting.
customer_reviews.author: kiki m.

customer_reviews.title: Like having wheels!

I can now easily slide my dresser back and forth as needed for easy access to the closet. I highly recommend this item! I was skeptical at first, but these gliders truly work with heavy furniture on carpet! It’s like having wheels on the bottom of my dresser!
customer_reviews.author: Dyonne Canamas

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!

As an aside and I know this isn't part of the purpose, there's a tiny bit of space between the plastic and the foamy material. I've dusted a tiny bit of Cimexa in that space as a help against potential problems (senior affordable housing high rise, got to be vigilant).
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Basic sliders
customer_reviews.text: These are kind of small to use on large furniture pieces, and the plastic side is not super slick. I mean, it's just smooth plastic, so it's not bad, but I've used other sliders in the past that had a different coating which have slid much easier over different kinds of carpet.
customer_reviews.author: BW

customer_reviews.title: Furniture moving made easy

customer_reviews.author: Jillian H.

customer_reviews.title: They work.

customer_reviews.title: Lets me use my wing chair on a carpet at my computer!

I had a hard carpet plastic mat before but it wasn't durable over the long term. And of course, when I'm not sitting on the chair it glides effortlessly. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Should have bought these sooner!
customer_reviews.text: These work great! My only down side is that they're a little large, although that's my fault since I bought them knowing the size. They slide great, the black part is firm enough to "hold onto" the foot of whatever piece of furniture that you're putting on this. I use these on my favorite char, and miniature tables, which allows me to move them around and makes clean up so much easier. Much relief for the back!

customer_reviews.title: just say no!

customer_reviews.title: product does what it is suppose to.

These also work great for if you have a hard surface floor and do not want the furniture to leave marks on the floor over time. Like some shelves I bought that had sharp edged surfaces on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: DA

customer_reviews.title: I've purchased these 3 times!
customer_reviews.text: I just installed new wood laminate floors throughout the house. My furniture is heavy oak and difficult to move around without the sliders. I love them - especially for when cleaning. I also have a small laundry room and put the sliders under the washer and dryer so I can shift them for cleaning, too! I'm VERY happy with my purchase and the sliders.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria L. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Permanent solution to wheelless ottomans!
customer_reviews.text: I glued these to the feet of some of my ottomans. I have 4. What brilliance that was! Hot glue gun. Done. They are nice ottomans too. Ethan Allen. customer_reviews.author: BrendaA.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Carpet Furniture Sliders that works great

customer_reviews.author: cr@Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!! Just What I Needed
customer_reviews.text: I have a rather heavy coffee table that we move alot when watching TV which was taking a toll on the legs. The furniture solders are easy to use and the table slides back and forth with ease. Don't worry about the width of your legs being smaller than the 3 1/2 inch slider. The furniture will sink into the cushion side and slide like butter!
customer_reviews.author: Rev. Treneater-Nur C. Horton

customer_reviews.title: These are AWESOME!! If I could give 100 stars
customer_reviews.text: These are AWESOME!! If I could give 100 stars, I would! We originally bought these to put under my kids' beds, but we have found that they work great on our VERY VERY heavy headboard set as well, and allow us to slide it around on our carpet like it's not even heavy!! We will definitely be ordering more of these!!!

customer_reviews.author: Cathi Felty

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: Okay for moving only. If you want to leave them to protect your carpet you will need a more sturdy product (wood or metal) as the plastic is too flexible and and will be caused to walk out from under furniture legs from sitting and rising movement. I have to put them back about every three days and its a pain. Will look for better model.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Great little gadgets
customer_reviews.text: Theses things work great, makes moving large or heavy objects on carpet much easier !! If you have a very long , or wide piece of furniture that isn't really heavy, let the thing set on the sliders a while so they "sink in " or add some " down " pressure on the item as you move so the item "seats " on the slider,making it " stick " to the slider, not want to move around on the cushion adhesion pad. Again, great little gizmo !!
customer_reviews.author: David M.

customer_reviews.title: Works very well

Have a few other things I need to move and will certainly use these for them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: makes moving furniture a breeze

I use these on all my furniture that touches carpet. I had to move the piece and it was a breeze. No heavy lifting. Over time my old ones crack and have to be replaced but the cost is minimal and very much worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Moving furniture on carpet is so much easier

Now if he changes his mind again, it won't be a problem.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for all my needs.

customer_reviews.author: Peter L.

customer_reviews.title: These Little Guys are Awesome!

product_meta.title: Smart Surface 8295 3-1/2" Round Carpet Furniture Sliders 16-Pack in Resealable Bag
product_meta.description: Designed to move items such as chairs, sofas, recliners, bookcases, desks, and cabinets across carpeted surfaces. Simply place the slider under each leg or corner of the object to be moved. The black non-stick gripper pad must face upwards. Slide object to be moved with ease! Sliders can be left in place if the item is moved frequently (for example, exercise equipment or to move items for cleaning) or be removed and reused again and again. This item features a resealable bag for easy storage.
